title: Low priority queue...
body:
I'll tell you guys a story about low priority queue, in 4chan format so it's easier to read.

>Playing a game on my smurf.
>I'm a little hungover, not doing so well in lane.
>Fuck this im out, peace.
>Low priority queue.
>Actually annoying having to wait 10 mins before starting a game, gaining faith in riot because this is a good system, I won't AFK again.
>played probably 20 games since then.
>Queue up, first game of the day, last pick.
>They pick Jinx, so I pick Blitz, should be an easy lane, our team comp is looking good.
>"A summoner has disconnected!"
>Oh no, Sivir isn't here, oh well I'll try to hold this lane 2v1 until he gets back.
>Get dived by jungler when they are all level 6. Seriously?
>Reksai can camp me, because top and mid are feeding HARD.
>They take 2 towers.
>I sit in base spamming wards and running around, not really doing much, just waiting for this hell to end. Literally impossible to win, they are in our base by 11 minutes.
>My team thinks Sivir is my duo.
>I get reported for AFK.
>Low priority queue, 20 minutes for 5 games.

**Fu** **cking seriously?**

replies.body: W/e I'll just make life hell for people for these 5 games I suppose.
Why would you do this? What would that achieve? All it does it prove why you should be in a low priority queue. There is no reason to purposely ruin other people's gaming experience.
Come backs are real, even when 4v5 the fact that you gave up and were waiting for the "Hell to end" makes me happy that you got placed low priority.
Looks like you were too drunk.

I'll try my own.

-be last week
-playing game as normal
-le gf comes shouting "omg we late"
-wtf.jpg
-"we have an appointment for 4 and it's 3.50"
-ffsbbcyaguys
-back home after 3 hrs
-got a warning, type "agree", no time penalty, no ban, no nothing
-proceed playing, no problems ever
-k.

Incidents don't trigger Leaverbuster. Unless you're Captain Risky. Riot doesn't insure Captain Risky.

I had the same experience... they think because you are walking around the summoner platform/base and not doing much you are actually AFK... the best way to avoid this is to go clear creep waves or attack enemy champions etc... 

my 5 game low priority queue happened 1 day after

Game 2, mid, idiot team, didn't even need to try to lose. GG.

Game 3. mid. Someone on the enemy team was a cocky d-bag I have played with before. So I decide to win this game. 

Game 4. mid again, destroyed a talon, had like triple his farm, was denying like a boss, 160 cs at 15 mins, talon had like 50. my jungler tries to gank for me, i specifically ask him to not come to my lane, and to not take my tower as im farming up a storm and getting fed, and maknig talon underfed. despite my requests he ults talon, talon ults and gets away, and sej takes my tower. I decide I would prefer to not win this game. :) GG

Game 5. mid once again. how do I keep getting mid?? anyways, adc twtich never connects, nasus gives up since it was a 4v5, easiest loss of my life.

No more low priority queue boys, we done it!
Game 1: Twisted Fate mid, pretended to have no idea what I was doing, had 50 cs by 20 minutes. mission accomplished.
